chapters.title: Chapter 24: Honey in the Tea
chapters.info: Serancha Colvine, p. 515—Aes Sedai of the Gray Ajah, and Head Clerk of the Gray Ajah (the head of the Grays). She was a very strong advocate of Andaya being raised Sitter. She has a pinched mouth and nose and pale blue pinched eyes. Seaine and Pevara put powdered itchoak in her shift when they were Accepted.
